title: Coronation Street's Katie McGlynn shows off body transformation ahead of Sinead's exit
text:

Katie McGlynn has been hitting the gym hard and wowing her fans with her body transformation.

The Coronation Street star, 26, took to Instagram to share snaps of herself lifting weights with her personal trainer this week.

Her workouts come ahead of her Corrie character Sinead Tinker's final scenes in the soap, which will air later this year.

In the photos she wears a black basketball top that had the word 'Princess' on the front and a pair of black leggings.

She sported a pair of grey trainer socks and black gloves as she felt the burn during her gym sesh.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Katie captioned the post: "I am feeling much better this week and feel like I am finally getting into the swing of training again."

She also said she appreciates having a trainer there to make her work hard.

The actress continued: "My will power is definitely kicking in, I attended a baby shower surrounded by cake and booze and usually when I have trained I think well fudge it & give into the cake!

"But not this time!

(Image: ITV)

"Liv watches my every move & really keeps me motivated - I don’t think I would have stuck to the diet so far without her.

"Bring on next week!"

Her fans rushed to compliment her hard work, with one writing: "Good for you you're smashing it."

"Keep up the fantastic work," another posted.

(Image: PA)

A third wrote: "I need your motivation! Come give me that kick I need girl."

It comes after Katie had a big party to celebrate filming her final scenes on Corrie.

Sinead will soon lose her battle with cancer after it spread throughout her body, with doctors giving her just months to live.
description: The soap star, 26, shared motivational pictures of herself lifting weights with her personal trainer this week
